lines.text: Look! They're a couple of old dudes! Tattoos are for hip young people!
Wh- Seeker, the <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c> clearly has tattoos on his face.
Yeah? You sure his face isn't just like that?
That- even if that weren't a shot in the dark, what the heck's up with your premise?
Tattoos are permanent. You get 'em when you're young, but they stick with you. That's the whole point.
Got my wife's name around my left bicep. Not that weird.
